thread.title: Draymond Green hit in face by basketball after Sixers' Alley-Oop
thread.title_full: Draymond Green hit in face by basketball after Sixers' Alley-Oop

author: Sara Harris (sharris@sportingnews.com)
title: Draymond Green hit in face by basketball after Sixers' Alley-Oop
text:
February 28, 2017 8:47am EST February 28, 2017 8:41am EST Ouch. Draymond Green (Getty Images) 
Updated at 8:47 a.m. ET 
Updated at 8:47 a.m. ET 
Draymond Green may have had to ice his face after the Warriors' 119-108 win over the Sixers on Monday night. 
As Richaun Holmes finished off a huge alley-oop, the ball found Green's face, and hit it â€” hard. Levitation (Richaun) Holmes! pic.twitter.com/G18sZGuObX
